<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Storm Shroud](/Feats.aspx?ID=3526) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3520)

</column>

---

You become surrounded by a swirling storm of rain, sand, snow, or clouds, whichever of those suits your bound terrain. This activity has traits appropriate to the storm you create— typically [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) for sand and [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) for rain, snow, or clouds. You become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) for 1 minute. You can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), as normal for concealment that makes your position obvious.
name: Storm Shroud
